attributes.action: honour a statue in memory of Jade Goody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that Jade Goody has highlighted to thousands of women throughout the country the defistating effects of cervical cancer. Her story has encouraged women the length and breath of the country to undergo smear tests on a regular basis. And i feel this would be a great way to remember her by.
